release.change: New: Doze battery stats now shows the times when a Doze maintenance window started/finished
Fixed: Missing permission causing mobile data not turning off when 'Disable Internet during Doze' is enabled
Fixed: Mobile data not turning off when 'Disable Internet during Doze' is enabled, and WiFi/mobile data are both enabled
Fixed: Random vibrations when 'Disable Internet during Doze' is enabled
